医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
集约化畜牧业可能会增加新出现的传染病风险研究人员警告说，集约化畜牧业可能会增加新流行病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Intective-livestock-farming-may-contribute-to-emerging-infectious-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Intective-livestock-farming-may-contribute-to-emerging-infectious-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42e2bafe-a92f-467c-a455-6cc8ce69424f Wed, 17 Jul 2024 14:14:22 -0400 Intensive livestock farming may contribute to emerging infectious disease risk
脊髓性肌萎缩症患者患脂肪肝的风险较高一项国际研究发现，患有神经退行性疾病脊髓性肌萎缩症 (SMA) 的人患脂肪肝的风险较高，这表明随着时间的推移，SMA 患者可能会面临额外的健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Spinal-肌肉萎缩-病人-are-at-higher-risk-of-developmenting-fatty-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Spinal-肌肉萎缩-病人-are-at-higher-risk-of-developmenting-fatty-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dffe15b0-fcae-410b-aad5-9f2581465a85 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 13:57:54 -0400 Spinal Muscular Atrophy patients are at higher risk of developing fatty liver disease
研究强调 RGS16 在神经胶质瘤进展中的作用中国山东大学齐鲁医院神经外科的李刚等人发表了一项关于 G 蛋白信号传导调节因子 16 (RGS16) 在神经胶质瘤（一种高度侵袭性中枢神经系统肿瘤）进展中的作用的综合研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Study-highlights-the-role-of-RGS16-in-glioma-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Study-highlights-the-role-of-RGS16-in-glioma-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98166660-4795-4b81-b56e-c084a2225c86 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 13:53:26 -0400 Study highlights the role of RGS16 in glioma progression
研究发现英国青少年每天消耗的热量三分之二来自超加工食品剑桥大学和布里斯托大学的最新研究发现，青少年每天消耗的热量大约有三分之二来自超加工食品（UPF）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Research-finds-UK-adolescents-consume-two-thirds-of-their-daily-calories-from-ultra-processed-foods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Research-finds-UK-adolescents-consume-two-thirds-of-their-daily-calories-from-ultra-processed-foods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bf4a37f-5eb7-43b3-a765-d4730dc831e8 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 13:49:39 -0400 Research finds UK adolescents consume two-thirds of their daily calories from ultra-processed foods
职场欺凌导致女性员工情绪疲惫和工作不满最新研究显示，巴基斯坦职场上针对女性的欺凌行为正在导致女工情绪疲惫和工作不满。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Workplace-bullying-drives-emotional-exhaustion-and-job-dissatisfaction-among-female-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Workplace-bullying-drives-emotional-exhaustion-and-job-dissatisfaction-among-female-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f395c8c-c6eb-43e6-88c8-d4c3ba391d8f Wed, 17 Jul 2024 13:41:10 -0400 Workplace bullying drives emotional exhaustion and job dissatisfaction among female workers
一条胳膊和一条腿：这位女士战胜了 8,000 美元的住院费医院设施费。他们感觉光是走进门就像是被收费了。医院表示，他们在拥有大量专业设备和人员的设施上花费了很多费用，比如急诊室。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-The-woman-who-beat-an-248000-hospital-fee.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-The-woman-who-beat-an-248000-hospital-fee.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a13dde6b-377d-4214-8966-6fa33cec599e Wed, 17 Jul 2024 13:05:30 -0400 An Arm and a Leg: The woman who beat an $8,000 hospital fee
她的听力植入物已获得预先批准。尽管如此，几个月来她还是收到了 139,000 美元的账单。凯特琳·麦 (Caitlyn Mai) 中学的一天早上醒来，头晕目眩，无法站立，一只耳朵聋了，这是由于感染影响了她的一侧脑神经。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Her-hearing-implant-was-preapproved-Nonetheless-she-got-24139000-bills-for-months.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Her-hearing-implant-was-preapproved-Nonetheless-she-got-24139000-bills-for-months.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=924ef304-ef78-43da-abdc-9dd1668e3225 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 13:02:18 -0400 Her hearing implant was preapproved. Nonetheless, she got $139,000 bills for months.
海洋真菌衍生的苯喹唑啉 B 可能是一种潜在的阿片类药物替代品阿片类药物长期以来被认为是具有显着药理作用的天然物质。它们已被用作有效的止痛药。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Marine-fungus-driven-aniquinazolin-B-could-be-a-pottial-opioid-alternative.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Marine-fungus-driven-aniquinazolin-B-could-be-a-potial-opioid-alternative.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69006484-dc6d-46c0-aec3-12eab44651b6 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 12:51:43 -0400 Marine fungus-derived aniquinazolin B could be a potential opioid alternative
输卵管水凝胶植入物为避孕和子宫内膜异位症提供双重解决方案水凝胶有多种用途，包括隐形眼镜、在体内输送一定剂量的药物、保湿剂、土壤中的储水、清洁污水以及作为胶凝剂和增稠剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Hydrogel-implant-for-fallopian-tubes-provides-dual-solution-for-contraception-and-endometriosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Hydrogel-implant-for-fallopian-tubes-provides-dual-solution-for-contraception-and-endometriosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5cb2ea0c-afe6-4fa9-915d-5d6f45142626 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 12:45:06 -0400 Hydrogel implant for fallopian tubes provides dual solution for contraception and endometriosis
2024年美国人支付医疗保健的能力再创新低根据 West Health-Gallup 医疗保健负担能力指数，能够负担和获得处方药和优质医疗保健的美国人比例降至 55% 的新低，自 2022 年以来下降了 6 个百分点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Americans-ability-to-afford-healthcare-hits-new-low-in-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Americans-ability-to-afford-healthcare-hits-new-low-in-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=890fceb2-b716-4c1d-8e8e-ca27a63d8e1f Wed, 17 Jul 2024 12:29:30 -0400 Americans' ability to afford healthcare hits new low in 2024
